text: tatha kaafiron ne kaha ki ham kadaapi eemaan nahin laayenge is quraan par aur na usapar, jo isase poorv kee pustak hain aur yadi aap dekhenge in atyaachaariyon ko khade hue apane paalanahaar ke samaksh, to ve doshaaropan kar rahe honge ek-doosare par. jo nirbal samajhe ja rahe the, ve kahenge unase, jo bade ban rahe theh yadi tum na hote, to ham avashy eemaan laane vaalon[1] mein hote
